I don't think it's possible to use the ț character in a verb...
Most likely because you can't actually type a ț easily on a normal keyboard, as it is not an English letter.
I would recommend just switching the ț out with a normal t unless somebody else has a better explanation.

Best of luck to you

The name of the verb is irrelevant as far as a player actually using it. What matters for that is the pattern field. You can call it "foo" if you like, and it wil work as long as pattern is correct. Just leave the erring character out of the verb name (or replace it with some supported character).

Hope that helps.
